Consultation

Consulting with a lawyer before you decide to hire one is always a good idea. Meeting with one of the firm‘s family law attorneys, face to face, will demonstrate how the firm might handle your case.

Attorney Fees & Costs

When it comes to hiring a Utah family law attorney you obviously have many sole practitioners and firms to choose from. Yet this single choice, more than any other, can save you the most money in the long run.

More Information >

Why Call 801-Divorce?

Because anyone facing the end of a marriage, or losing the right to see their child, wants a trusted, aggressive litigation team led by seasoned divorce attorneys.
